${ModID}:TodoItem.NAME: Druidic Deck
${ModID}:TodoItem.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw 2 fewer cards. NL Up to #b
Energy is now conserved between turns. NL Playing Monkeys, Basic Bloons, and Basic cards grants an additional card next turn. NL Retain Monkeys in your hand.

${ModID}:TodoItemPro.NAME: Heroic Deck
${ModID}:TodoItemPro.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 2 energy and draw 2 fewer cards. NL Up to #b
Energy is now conserved between turns. NL Retain Bloons in your hand.

${ModID}:BloonTrap.NAME: Bloon Trap
${ModID}:BloonTrap.FLAVOR: A bloon containment device created by top Monkey Engineers...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Gold when Bloons are exhausted. 0 and 1 cost Bloons gain Ethereal.

${ModID}:Becquerel.NAME: Wolf Plush
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a Wolf to your hand.

${ModID}:FutureCrystal.NAME: Cue Ball
${ModID}:FutureCrystal.FLAVOR: See into the future and sabotage incoming bloons.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Large Bloons are 25% weaker, but gain 1 energy when a Large Bloon is played.

${ModID}:Watch.NAME: Delicate Watch
${ModID}:Watch.FLAVOR: I'm going to rub it in your face SO HARD when that thing inevitably breaks..
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase damage by #b20%. Taking damage to below 25% health #rbreaks this relic.

${ModID}:APRounds.NAME: Armor-Piercing Rounds
${ModID}:APRounds.FLAVOR: ..these rounds are supposed to pierce armor. Not pierce through the armor, five feet of reinforced concrete, a few warehouses, and an armored truck.

${ModID}:BigSpicy.NAME: Ignition Tank
${ModID}:BigSpicy.FLAVOR: Contains a cocktail of the galaxy's most flammable substances.

${ModID}:ATG.NAME: AtG Missile Mk. 1
${ModID}:ATG.FLAVOR: ..shoulder-mounted missile launcher.. loaded with AtG Viper Missiles...
